mapper.select: SELECT R.RECOMMEND_NUMBER, R.RECOMMEND_NAME, F.RECOMMEND_FILE_NAME FROM TBL_RECOMMEND R LEFT JOIN TBL_RECOMMEND_FILE F ON R.RECOMMEND_NUMBER = F.RECOMMEND_NUMBER WHERE R.RECOMMEND_SPECIES = #{recommendSpecies} AND R.RECOMMEND_PERSONALITY LIKE '%'||#{recommendPersonality}||'%' AND R.RECOMMEND_COLOR LIKE '%'||#{recommendColor}||'%' AND R.RECOMMEND_LENGTH LIKE '%'||#{recommendLength}||'%' AND R.RECOMMEND_SIZE = #{recommendSize} AND R.RECOMMEND_ALOPECIA LIKE #{recommendAlopecia}

SELECT R.RECOMMEND_NAME, F.RECOMMEND_FILE_NAME, R.RECOMMEND_SPECIES, R.RECOMMEND_PERSONALITY, R.RECOMMEND_COLOR, R.RECOMMEND_LENGTH , R.RECOMMEND_SIZE, R.RECOMMEND_ALOPECIA, R.RECOMMEND_CONTENT1, R.RECOMMEND_CONTENT2, R.RECOMMEND_CONTENT3 FROM TBL_RECOMMEND R LEFT JOIN TBL_RECOMMEND_FILE F ON R.RECOMMEND_NUMBER = F.RECOMMEND_NUMBER WHERE R.RECOMMEND_NUMBER = #{recommendNumber}
